Module jGame
Package jGame.core.ui.hud

Class UIHud

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHud
  • public class UIHud
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Heads Up Display (HUD) to be rendered on the screen on top of the game after every entity has been updated and rendered.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nuno Pereira

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.List<UIHudElement> HUD

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addHUDUIElement​(UIHudElement hudElement)
      Adds a UIHudElement to this classe's internal list in order to be rendered, if it hasn't been already added.
      static java.util.List<UIHudElement> getHud()
      Returns the HUD elements.
      static void registerInputListeners()
      Registers each element's input listener, if there is one.
      static void removeHUDUIElement​(UIHudElement hudElement)
      Removes a UIHudElement from the list so it is no longer rendered.
      static void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Renders all UIHudElements to the screen
      static void sortElements​(boolean order)
      Sorts all the elements in this HUD according to their zIndex
      static void updateInputListeners()

        public static void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)

      • addHUDUIElement

        public static void addHUDUIElement​(UIHudElement hudElement)
        Adds a UIHudElement to this classe's internal list in order to be rendered, if it hasn't been already added.
        Parameters:
        hudElement - the UIHudElement to be added
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • sortElements

        public static void sortElements​(boolean order)
        Sorts all the elements in this HUD according to their zIndex
        Parameters:
        order - the order in which to sort element: true for regular, false for backwards
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • removeHUDUIElement

        public static void removeHUDUIElement​(UIHudElement hudElement)
        Removes a UIHudElement from the list so it is no longer rendered.
        Parameters:
        hudElement - the UIHudElement to be removed
        Since:
        1.0.0
